Package cryptoTrader.tradingManagement.broker

Class BrokerImpl

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.tradingManagement.broker.BrokerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Broker
public class BrokerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Broker
This class implements the Broker Interface. Each broker has an ID, name, coins, strategies, and trade history.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    BrokerImpl​(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<Cryptocoin> coinList, Strategy strategy, int iteration)
    Constructor creates a BrokerImpl object with a given name, coin list and strategy.

  • Constructor Details

    • BrokerImpl

      public BrokerImpl​(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<Cryptocoin> coinList, Strategy strategy, int iteration)
      Constructor creates a BrokerImpl object with a given name, coin list and strategy.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the broker
      coinList - cryptocoin list held by the broker
      strategy - strategy followed by the broker
      iteration - the key of the hashMap which will hold this specific broker's strategy and coin list

  • Method Details

    • updateStrategyAndCoin

      public void updateStrategyAndCoin​(Strategy strategy, java.util.List<Cryptocoin> coinList, int iteration)
      Adds a new entry into the broker's strategy map and coin map based on user input.
      Specified by:
      updateStrategyAndCoin in interface Broker
      Parameters:
      strategy - the new strategy to be added into the broker's strategy map
      coinList - the new entry to be added into the broker's coin map
      iteration - the key of the strategy map and coin map to which the new entry should be added

      public void addTrade​(Trade trade)
      Adds a trade to the broker's trade history
      Specified by:
      addTrade in interface Broker
      Parameters:
